languages.text: "Старшая хранительница записей Мерит Санквида, временно занимаю пост Высокого фактотума после того, как глубокоуважаемый Данрок... преставился". {n}Мерит через силу сглатывает, вы видите, как ее бьет крупная дрожь.{/n} "Я служила счетоводом при Янрисе и в курсе всех торговых процессов Лорд-капитана. Уверяю, ваши дела продолжаются без единой задержки и помехи — все подданные Данрока пекутся об этом день и ночь!"

"Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"
languages.original_text: "Старшая хранительница записей Мерит Санквида, временно занимаю пост Высокого фактотума после того, как глубокоуважаемый Данрок... преставился". {n}Мерит через силу сглатывает, вы видите, как ее бьет крупная дрожь.{/n} "Я служила счетоводом при Янрисе и в курсе всех торговых процессов Лорд-капитана. Уверяю, ваши дела продолжаются без единой задержки и помехи — все подданные Данрока пекутся об этом день и ночь!"

I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

"Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

languages.text: "Meryt Sancvida, leitende Hüterin der Aufzeichnungen, aktuell in der Position des Hoch-Faktotums des Schiffs, seit der geschätzte Meister Danrok ... verschieden ist." {n}Sie schluckt, und du bemerkst, dass sie stark zittert.{/n} "Ich war seine Buchhalterin und bin mit den geschäftlichen Angelegenheiten des Lord Captain wohlvertraut. Ich versichere Euch, sämtliche Transaktionen werden fehler- und verzögerungsfrei durchgeführt – die Untergebenen des verstorbenen Meister Danrok arbeiten Tag und Nacht, um das sicherzustellen!"
languages.original_text: "Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

traits.locale_text: "Meryt Sancvida, leitende Hüterin der Aufzeichnungen, aktuell in der Position des Hoch-Faktotums des Schiffs, seit der geschätzte Meister Danrok ... verschieden ist." {n}Sie schluckt, und du bemerkst, dass sie stark zittert.{/n} "Ich war seine Buchhalterin und bin mit den geschäftlichen Angelegenheiten des Lord Captain wohlvertraut. Ich versichere Euch, sämtliche Transaktionen werden fehler- und verzögerungsfrei durchgeführt – die Untergebenen des verstorbenen Meister Danrok arbeiten Tag und Nacht, um das sicherzustellen!"

languages.text: « Archiviste en chef Méryt Sancvida. Je fais temporairement office de haut factotum sur ce vaisseau suite à la... fin de service de l'honorable maître Danrok. » {n}Elle déglutit, et vous remarquez qu'elle tremble violemment.{/n} « J'étais sa comptable, je connais donc bien les affaires {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Je peux vous assurer que toutes vos transactions sont exécutées sans faute ni retard ; les subordonnés de feu maître Danrok travaillent jour et nuit pour les mener à bien ! »
languages.original_text: "Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

traits.locale_text: « Archiviste en chef Méryt Sancvida. Je fais temporairement office de haut factotum sur ce vaisseau suite à la... fin de service de l'honorable maître Danrok. » {n}Elle déglutit, et vous remarquez qu'elle tremble violemment.{/n} « J'étais sa comptable, je connais donc bien les affaires {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Je peux vous assurer que toutes vos transactions sont exécutées sans faute ni retard ; les subordonnés de feu maître Danrok travaillent jour et nuit pour les mener à bien ! »

languages.text: “首席记录官梅丽特·桑克维达。自尊敬的丹罗克大师……结束任期之后，我便暂时担任这艘船上的高阶顾问一职。”{n}她咽了咽口水，你注意到她浑身都在剧烈颤抖。{/n}“我曾是他的簿记员，对大人您的商业交易了如指掌。我向您保证，您所有的交易都会顺利完成，不会出现任何差错或延误！已故的丹罗克大师的全体部下，都愿意为您日夜操劳，保证所有交易顺利完成！”
languages.original_text: "Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

traits.locale_text: “首席记录官梅丽特·桑克维达。自尊敬的丹罗克大师……结束任期之后，我便暂时担任这艘船上的高阶顾问一职。”{n}她咽了咽口水，你注意到她浑身都在剧烈颤抖。{/n}“我曾是他的簿记员，对大人您的商业交易了如指掌。我向您保证，您所有的交易都会顺利完成，不会出现任何差错或延误！已故的丹罗克大师的全体部下，都愿意为您日夜操劳，保证所有交易顺利完成！”

languages.text: 「レコードワーデン主任、メリト・サンクヴィーダと申します。任期を満了したマスター・ダンロックに代わり…一時的に船のハイ・ファクトタムの任に就かせていただきました」{n}息を呑んだ彼女は、激しく震えているのが見て取れる。{/n}「彼の帳簿係として働いておりましたので、ロード・キャプテンの商取引についてはよく存じております。あなた様の取引がすべて正確に遅滞なく完了することを保証いたします――そのために故マスター・ダンロックの部下一同、日夜努力する所存でございます！」
languages.original_text: "Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

traits.locale_text: 「レコード・ワーデン主任、メリト・サンクヴィーダが…任期を満了されたマスター・ダンロックに代わり、一時的に船のハイ・ファクトタムの任に就かせていただきます」{n}息を呑んだ彼女は、激しく震えているのが見て取れる。{/n}「彼の帳簿係として働いておりましたので、ロード・キャプテンの商取引についてはよく存じております。あなたの全取引が正確に遅滞なく完了することを保証いたしますーー故マスター・ダンロックの配下たちはそのために日夜努力する所存にございます！」

languages.text: «Mi nombre es Meryt Sancvida, jefa de archivo, temporalmente realizando las labores de Sumo Factótum de esta nave a raíz del... fallecimiento del nuestro estimado maestro Danrok». {n}Traga saliva, y ves como empieza a temblar bruscamente.{/n} «Ejercí como su contable y estoy bien informada de los asuntos comerciales {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. Le aseguro que sus transacciones se realizarán sin falta ni demora; ¡los subordinados del finado maestro Danrok se esforzaban día y noche porque así fuera!».
languages.original_text: "Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi nombre es Meryt Sancvida, jefa de archivo, temporalmente realizando las labores de Sumo Factótum de esta nave a raíz del... fallecimiento del nuestro estimado maestro Danrok». {n}Traga saliva, y ves como empieza a temblar bruscamente.{/n} «Ejercí como su contable y estoy bien informada de los asuntos comerciales {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. Le aseguro que sus transacciones se realizarán sin falta ni demora; ¡los subordinados del finado maestro Danrok se esforzaban día y noche porque así fuera!».

languages.text: "Bendeniz Meryt Sancvida. Başdefterdar'ım. Saygın Üstat Danrok'un... Aramızdan ayrılışından bu yana geçici olarak geminin Arşıkâhyalığı vazifesini üstleniyorum. {n}Meryt yutkunuyor. Kadının şiddetle titrediğini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Üstat Danrok'a sayman olarak hizmet ediyordum ve Lord Kaptanımızın iş ilişkileri hakkında ziyadesiyle bilgi sahibiyim. Tüm ticari işlemlerinizin kusursuz ve gecikmesiz olarak gerçekleştiği konusunda sizi temin edebilirim: Merhum Üstat Danrok'un astları olarak bunun için gece gündüz demeden emek sarf ediyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "Chief Record Warden Meryt Sancvida, temporarily holding the position of the ship's High Factotum since the esteemed Master Danrok's... termination." {n}She gulps, and you notice that she is shaking violently.{/n} "I served as his bookkeeper and am well apprised of the Lord Captain's business dealings. I assure you that all your transactions are being completed without fault or delay — the late Master Danrok's subordinates toil day and night to ensure that they are!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben Meryt Sancvida. Başdefterdarım. Saygın Üstat Danrok'un... Aramızdan ayrılışından bu yana geçici olarak geminin Arşıkâhyası rolünü üstleniyorum. {n}Meryt yutkunuyor ve şiddetle titrediğini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Üstat Danrok'a sayman olarak hizmet ediyordum ve Lord Kaptan'ımızın ticari işlerinden iyice haberdarım. Tüm ticari işlemlerinizin kusursuz ve gecikmesiz olarak gerçekleştiği konusunda sizi temin edebilirim: Merhum Üstat Danrok'un astları olarak bunun içi gece gündüz demeden emek sarf ediyoruz!"
